Fields in org.jvnet.substance.api with type parameters of type SubstanceColorSchemeBundle

Methods in org.jvnet.substance.api that return SubstanceColorSchemeBundle
 SubstanceColorSchemeBundle SubstanceColorSchemeBundle.transform(ColorSchemeTransform transform)
          Creates a new color scheme bundle that has the same settings as this color scheme bundle with the addition of applying the specified color scheme transformation on all the relevant color schemes
 

Methods in org.jvnet.substance.api with parameters of type SubstanceColorSchemeBundle
